biography.value: This horrific albino garmyr stands well over twelve feet tall. He is covered in a mass of yellowish-white mangy fur, bloodstained and scarred from countless battles, and clad in a patchwork armour of leather, chain, and bladed plate with trophies—mummified heads—hanging from his belt. A mane of bony spines and tufts of barbed grey hair jut out from his head and down his back to a long white tail braided with skulls and bone fragments. His snarling visage is filled with long, razor-sharp fangs and smouldering red eyes. The Lord of The Feast holds an oversized longbow, strung with thick sinew. A quiver on his back holds enormous arrows, some bristling with barbed snares, others connected to coils of chains around the beast's wrists, while others are tipped with delerium shards.

description.value: The Lord of the Feast makes three attacks: either one with each of its different arrow attacks, or one with his bite and two with his claws.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+9]]{+9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 ([[/damage 2d10 + 4 type=piercing]]) damage plus 18 ([[/damage 4d8 type=necrotic]]) damage. A target hit by this attack must succeed on a [[/save ability=constitution dc=17]] saving throw or gain one level of contamination.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+9]]{+9} to hit, reach 10 ft, one target. Hit: 11 ([[/damage 2d6 + 4 type=slashing]]) damage.

Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+9]]{+9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ([[/damage 2d8 + 4 type=piercing]]) damage plus 18 ([[/damage 4d8 type=necrotic]]) damage. A target hit by this attack must succeed on a [[/save ability=constitution dc=17]] saving throw or gain one level of contamination.

Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+9]]{+9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ([[/damage 2d8 + 4 type=piercing]]) damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a [[/save ability=dexterity dc=17]] saving throw or become &Reference[condition=restrained] in a magical snare for 1 minute. A &Reference[condition=restrained] target can use its action to repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+9]]{+9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 13 ([[/damage 2d8 + 4 type=piercing]]) damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on [[/save ability=strength dc=17]] saving throw or be pulled up to 20 feet directly toward the Lord of the Feast.
If the Lord of the Feast fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

activation.condition: If the Lord of the Feast fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

description.value: The Lord of the Feast regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point remaining.
Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on the Lord of the Feast's ranged attack rolls.
The Lord of the Feast has advantage on Wisdom (&Reference[skill=Perception]) checks. He can pinpoint the position of any creature within 120 feet of him that is &Reference[condition=invisible].
The Lord of the Feast moves his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
The Lord of the Feast makes one arrow attack of his choice.

The Lord of the Feast releases a blood-curdling howl which can be heard all across Drakkenheim. Garmyr within 60 feet who can see and hear the Lord of the Feast can use their reaction to move up to half their speed and make one melee or ranged attack with advantage.

The lord of the feast can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The lord of the feast regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

  • @UUID[Actor.5p09sFFTTxLicXVR.Item.p7JdUu0hFCpoQWYl]{Dash}
  • @UUID[Actor.5p09sFFTTxLicXVR.Item.fHzfv8kdvD2422TG]{Arrow}
  • @UUID[Actor.5p09sFFTTxLicXVR.Item.gMJN5B0hO5MqGPQf]{Call of the Hunt}
